title: Math Homework
description: Complete a set of math problems involving algebra and calculus. This assignment is worth 20 marks and is of intermediate difficulty.

title: History Essay
description: Write a 500-word essay on a historical event of your choice. This assignment is relatively easy and carries 15 marks.

title: Science Project
description: Create a science project presentation on a topic of your choosing. This is a challenging assignment worth 30 marks.

title: Literature Analysis
description: Analyze a piece of literature and write a critical analysis essay. This assignment is of intermediate difficulty and is worth 18 marks.

title: Programming Assignment
description: Write a program to solve a complex problem. This advanced programming assignment carries 25 marks.

title: Art Project
description: Create an art project using your preferred medium. This assignment is relatively easy and is worth 12 marks.

title: Geography Quiz
description: Take a geography quiz covering countries, capitals, and landmarks. This easy assignment carries 10 marks.

title: Chemistry Lab Report
description: Conduct a chemistry experiment and write a detailed lab report. This intermediate assignment is worth 22 marks.

title: Physical Education Journal
description: Keep a journal of your physical education activities and progress. This easy assignment carries 8 marks.

title: Music Performance
description: Prepare and perform a musical piece of your choice. This challenging assignment is worth 28 marks.

title: Language Translation
description: Translate a text from one language to another and provide an explanation. This intermediate assignment carries 16 marks.

title: Biology Research Paper
description: Conduct in-depth research and write a biology research paper. This challenging assignment is worth 24 marks.

title: Computer Science Project
description: Develop a complex software project in the field of computer science. This assignment is of advanced difficulty and carries 30 marks.

title: Economics Presentation
description: Create a presentation on an economic topic and deliver it to the class. This intermediate assignment is worth 18 marks.

title: Physics Problem Set
description: Solve a set of physics problems related to various concepts. This intermediate assignment carries 14 marks.

title: Psychology Case Study
description: Conduct a case study in psychology and present your findings. This challenging assignment is worth 26 marks.

title: Environmental Science Report
description: Research and write a report on an environmental science topic. This intermediate assignment carries 20 marks.

title: Sociology Essay
description: Write an essay on a sociological issue or concept. This intermediate assignment is worth 17 marks.

title: Foreign Language Oral Exam
description: Prepare and take an oral exam in a foreign language. This intermediate assignment carries 12 marks.
